Photos

A JOURNEY IN PICTURES

This page has photos of the masjid through various stages of construction. It will be frequently updated as major works are completed in every section of the masjid. Check frequently to follow the journey.

 

For construction drawings showing the masjid interior and listing the progress, check the Construction page.
